institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 16 (Report on Project Implementation Status)
contents: Article 16 (Report on Project Implementation Status) ① Supported companies must join the small and medium-sized learning support system designated by the chairman of the board and regularly register and manage learning organization activity details and performance, etc., ② Supported companies are subject to provisional seizure, court receivership, and suspension of business. , If any unusual event, such as business closure, occurs, it must be immediately reported to the head of the affiliated organization., ③ The head of the affiliated agency may be unable to continue carrying out the project due to the unusual occurrence of paragraph 2 in the applicant company or the applicant company's insincere business performance, business abandonment, etc. If it is deemed difficult, necessary measures, such as suspending business, must be taken and reported to the chairman.
